Jan 15, 2003

Airstrikes In Southern Iraq ‘No-Fly’ Zone Mount

> “U.S. and British warplanes have bombed more than 80 targets in Iraq’s southern "no-fly" zone over the past five months, conducting an escalating air war even as U.N. weapons inspections proceed and diplomats look for ways to head off a full-scale war.” (washingtonpost.com)
